certifications.name: Information Technology, Software Development Major
certifications.description: I loved this program. The main concepts covered are object orientated programming, database adminstration, and web development. They also throw in an occasional fun class like Interface design and Communications. I graduated with a GPA of 3.8.

certifications.name: IBM Full Stack Cloud Developer
certifications.description: This was my first experience with a lot of modern web dev tech. React, Docker, JSON objects, Cloud infrastructure, and Python. Taking a application from development through scaling to deployment on IBM Cloud.

certifications.name: MERN Stack - The Complete Guide
certifications.description: MERN - MongoDB, Express, React, Node. In this tutorial style course, I learned how to develop an ecommerce store. This was also my first time working without a SQL database, couldn't believe how efficient Mongo is.

certifications.name: Graph Developer - Associate
certifications.description: In this five course tutorial I became familiar with GraphQL and some of Apollo's features. This tutorial helped me step up my development game by becoming familiar with Schema first design.
